channel.title: Shravan's sketchbook
channel.description: This is My New Hugo Site

item.title: Shravan Mayilan
item.author: Author
item.description: Shravan is a talented young artist who lives with his mom, dad and sister in Orlando, FL. He is overcoming his speech and social skills deficits by creating art. He loves the sensory nature of creating art. His favorite medium is acrylic and loves doing still-life.

item.title: Oranges
item.author: Author
item.description: Acrylic on canvas. Won the first place on Top Talent 2021 conducted among OCPS schools district. Organized by a Foundation for Orange County Public School Events

item.title: Lufrano Gallery
item.author: Author
item.description: Pineapple painting selected for the Arts4All Florida in partnership with the University of North Florida Exceptional Creativity Exhibition. Was on display June 25, 2021 - August 26, 2021

item.title: Family
item.author: Author
item.description: Exciting news! My drawing for the Education Guide of Central Florida art contest has been selected as one of the top 10 finalists!

item.title: Squares
item.author: Author
item.description: Geometric shapes are a favorite when doodling.
